description:
Greg has to be one of the friendliest guys I've met so far. He's very talkative and he just has this very midwest feel to him. He's interested in being an adult film star so I'm happy to give him his first bit of exposure. He's definitely not camera shy...
The best part of this video is at the end. Take a look and you'll see what I mean when I say I had a hard time keeping his "spurts" in the frame!
title: Greg
